DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe United States America . The aim trial compare pharmacokinetics ( exposure trial drug body ) nonacog beta pegol ( N9-GP ) ALPROLIX® patient haemophilia B .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Nonacog Beta Pegol ( N9-GP ) ALPROLIX® Patients With Haemophilia B
DOC.criteria: Male , age 1870 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Patients diagnosis congenital haemophilia B factor IX activity equal 2 % , base medical record History 150 exposure day factor IX containing product Known history factor IX inhibitor Inhibitors factor IX ( equal 0.6 BU ) screening measure Nijmegen modify Bethesda method Immunocompromised ( CD4+ T cell equal 200/μL ) Known congenital acquire coagulation disorder haemophilia B Body mass index 35 kg/m^²
